name: kpt-functions-catalog-docs
description: Generate docs for config functions catalog
author: KPT Authors

scripts.gen-docs: node index_generator.js Source > ../sources/README.md; node index_generator.js Sink > ../sinks/README.md; node index_generator.js Generator > ../generators/README.md; node index_generator.js Transformer > ../transformers/README.md; node index_generator.js Validator > ../validators/README.md
